Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼンから来た男
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen's Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールから来た男
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 妙な静けさですね…… 不気味な感じっていうか……
Entry.EnglishText: It's oddly silent here... It feels almost eerie...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少し街の中を見て回ろう。 何もなければ、それでいい。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's take a look around town. Hopefully we won't find anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こるかわからない。 とにかく気をつけるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: You never know what could happen. It's always a good idea to be careful!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは私たちガジュマを 見下してるのよ！ 前々から許せなかったの！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma always look down on us! How can I forgive them after all this time!

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women...

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様を守るにふさわしいのは ワシらガジュマじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: The only ones worthy of proctectin' the Azure Beast are us Gajuma!
Entry.Notes: The only ones worthy of protecting Lord "蒼獣Soujuu?)" are us Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「力をもって聖殿を護り、 襲い来る邪を滅す、 勇ましき蒼獣の徒ガジュマ。 良き信仰者となり、蒼獣を護れ」
Entry.EnglishText: Defending the sacred shrine of power, striking down all manner of evil, oh brave Gajima, our disciples, protect the sanctity of the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>蒼獣聖典<White>には こう書いてあるんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: That's what's written in the <Blue>Azure Beast's Scriptures<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 蒼獣様を守るにふさわしいのは ワシらガジュマじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: The only ones worthy of protectin' the Azure Beast are us Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 愚かしきヒューマよ、 蒼獣様のお言葉を 特別に聞かせてやろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Foolish Huma! Heed well the scripture of the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「力をもって聖殿を護り、 襲い来る邪を滅す、 勇ましき蒼獣の徒ガジュマ。 良き信仰者となり、蒼獣を護れ」
Entry.EnglishText: Defending the sacred shrine of power, striking down all manner of evil, oh brave Gajima, our disciples, protect the sanctity of the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり蒼獣様を守るにふさわしいのは ヒューマではなく、ワシらガジュマじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Basically, it's us Gajuma, not Huma, who are worthy of protectin' the Azure Beast!

Entry.JapaneseText: アイフリードって知ってるかい？ 北の海を荒らして、数々の秘宝を モノにしたっていう伝説の海賊さ。
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know about the pirate Aifread? Legend has it he plundered many treasures while terrorizing the North sea!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなスゴイヤツなんだ。 当然、ガジュマに違いないぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: What a hero! Naturally, he must have been a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ヤツの子孫が、今も ベルサスにいるらしいね。 会ってみたいなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: That reminds me, I've heard that his descendant lives in Belsas. I'd sure like to meet them some day!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガキンチョが ぞろぞろつるんで遠足かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you Huma brats on a field trip or somethin'?
Entry.Notes: "Are those Huma brats going on a field trip together"?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの先生に 迷惑をかけるんじゃないぞ！ ウシシシシ……
Entry.EnglishText: You'd better not cause your Gajuma teacher any trouble! Hehehehehe....

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマを見かける度に ついついイヤミを言って しまうんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I see a Huma, I can't help but get upset at them...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何がムカつくってワケじゃないんだ。 強いて言うなら、ヒューマだから…… そういう事なんだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: It ain't for any specific reason, though. If I absolutely had to guess why, I'd say it's because... they're Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガキンチョが ぞろぞろつるんで遠足かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you Huma brats on a field trip or somethin'?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの先生に 迷惑をかけるんじゃないぞ！ ウシシシシ……
Entry.EnglishText: You'd better not cause your Gajuma teacher any trouble! Hehehehehe....

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのガキンチョが ぞろぞろつるんで遠足かい？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you Huma brats on a field trip or somethin'?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんまり遠くへ行くと 帰ってこられなくなるぞ。 ウシシシシ……
Entry.EnglishText: If you stray too far, you'll never make it home! Hehehehe....

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでも、山の上のヒューマどもが ガジュマを脅したりダマしたりして 港側へ追いやったんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that the Huma on the hill threatened, cheated, and then drove the Gajuma all the way down here to the port.

Entry.JapaneseText: 急にガジュマばっかりになったけど、 かえって、気が楽だよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Suddenly, there are only Gajuma here now. Honestly, I feel more at ease.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうせなら、男女だけじゃなくて、 「ガジュマとヒューマは会話禁止」 って戒律にすりゃいいのにな。
Entry.EnglishText: Man, if only the commandment forbade Huma from talking to Gajuma, instead of men and women...

Entry.JapaneseText: よくわからないけど…… ガジュマとヒューマがモメるなら 別々に暮らすほうがいいんじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure, but... Since Huma and Gajuma fight so much, anyway, it makes sense to live separately, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 別に、何か困る事があるとも 思えないし……
Entry.EnglishText: Honestly, I can't think of anything wrong with that, myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: よくわからないけど…… ガジュマとヒューマがモメるなら 別々に暮らすほうがいいんじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure, but... Since Huma and Gajuma fight so much, anyway, it makes sense to live separately, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 別に、何か困る事があるとも 思えないし……
Entry.EnglishText: Honestly, I can't think of anything wrong with that, myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸のほうから何か聞こえるね。 ノルゼンは大丈夫かな……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard news from the East Continent. I sure hope Nolzen is alright...

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダが沈んだんだって……？ こんな時に、ガジュマとかヒューマとか 言ってる場合じゃないよな。
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda has been destroyed...? At times like this, Huma and Gajuma should put aside their differences.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、そう思えない人も チラホラいるみたいなんだ。 小さな事だと思うんだけどなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Seems a few people here and there disagree though, thinking this isn't anything special...

Entry.JapaneseText: ひゃー暑い！
Entry.EnglishText: Jeeeez, It's hot!

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺、ずっと北の方で育ったから、 暑くて暑くて…… 日干しになりそうだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I was born and raised up North, y'see. I can't take this ridiculous heat! I'm gonna dry out at this rate!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あんまり近くに来ないでくれ。 ガジュマが近くに来ると、どうにも 荒っぽい気分になるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: D-Don't come any closer. Whenever Gajuma get near me, I tend to get violent...

Entry.JapaneseText: 普通にしてる分には、 大丈夫なんだけどさ…… どうなってるんだ、オレ……
Entry.EnglishText: It doesn't happen if you keep some distance though... What's wrong with me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが近くに来ると、 どうにもイヤな気分になるんだ。 どうしてなんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever Gajuma get close to me, I can't help but get agitated. I don't know why...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あんまり近くに来ないでくれ。 ガジュマが近くに来ると、どうにも 荒っぽい気分になるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: D-Don't come any closer. Whenever Gajuma get near me, I tend to get violent...

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々試してみたんだけど どうやっても治らないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: No matter what I try, I can't seem to get over it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 船乗りに聞いたんだけど、 他の街に比べたらバビログラードは マシなんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: A sailor told me that compared to the other towns he's been to, Babilograd is the best of 'em all!

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街にいる時はイラついてたのに、 ここでは少し楽になるんだってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: The time I spent in other cities was rough, but here things are a little better.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、しばらくはここで 暮らす事にしたんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I think I'll stay here quite a while, actually...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガ……ガジュマ…… 近づくんじゃない!!
Entry.EnglishText: G-Gajuma! S-Stay back!

Entry.JapaneseText: 言う事聞かないと、オレはおまえに 何するかわかんねえぞ!! さっさと消えろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't listen to me, I dunno what I'll do to you! Now back off!

Entry.JapaneseText: 聞いたことあるぜ、 <Blue>幻の島<White>。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard of something called the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええと……でもどこにあるかは 知らねえ。幻だしな。
Entry.EnglishText: I, uh, dunno where it is though. You might say it's... illusive!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガ……ガジュマ…… 近づくんじゃない!!
Entry.EnglishText: G-Gajuma! S-Stay back!

Entry.JapaneseText: 言う事聞かないと、オレはおまえに 何するかわかんねえぞ!! さっさと消えろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: If you don't listen to me, I dunno what I'll do to you! Now back off!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街にいれば落ち着くと 思っていたのに…… 最近、どうにもダメなんだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: I thought for sure this town would calm me down, but more and more I feel like it's just not gonna happen...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマを見ると…… 殺してやる……って気分に…… オレ、自分が怖いよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever I see a Gajuma... I can't help it... I feel like... Like I need to kill them... I don't know why. I'm so scared...

Entry.JapaneseText: ついこの前まで、 ガジュマが近づくだけで、 ピリピリしてたんだけどさ…… 急に楽になったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Until just a bit ago, whenever a Gajuma would get near me, I'd get so horribly violent, but... Suddenly, I feel much calmer...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマともケンカしたし、 イヤな事も言われたけどさ、 向こうもそうだったのかなって……
Entry.EnglishText: I actually fought with a Gajuma, and he said some pretty nasty things to me. I guess now I know how it feels...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレは水に流す事にしたけど、 そうじゃない人もいるみたいだよ。 むずかしいもんだな……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm willing to bury the hatchet, but I reckon there are still a few people holding onto grudges.

Entry.JapaneseText: 東大陸のほうから、 ヘンな音が聞こえるような 気がするんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard a weird noise coming from the Eastern continent. It's got me all shaken up...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレの気のせいかな…… イヤ、聞こえるよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Did I imagine it? No, you heard it too, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街はなんか戒律とかがあって、 何かとよそ者には厳しいね。 俺、そういうの苦手……
Entry.EnglishText: This town's got some kind of commandment and is real harsh to outsiders. I'm not a fan of that...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
